Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to storm hardening and system resiliency plans
Summary: Requires each electric corporation to submit a storm hardening and system resiliency plan that covers the immediate ten-year period to the public service commission for review and approval; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง66, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to storm hardening and system resiliency plans
